full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO'I MGON PO RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG PO LA BSTOD CING GSOL 'DEBS PA'I TSUL DON GNYIS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(DE LTAR RGYAL BA THAMS CAD KYI MKHYEN BRTZE NUS GSUM GYI BDAG NYID BDAG CAG RNAMS LA BKA' DRIN 'KHOR MTHA' MA MCHIS PA KHYAB BDAG 'KHOR LO'I MGON PO ^RJE BTZUN BLO BZANG BSTAN PA'I RGYAL MTSAN DPAL BZANG POS BSTOD CING GSOL BA 'DEBS 'DI TSUL 'DI YANG GANG GI RNAM THAR LA MI PHYED DAD PAS KUN NAS BSLANG STE, RANG NYID SKYES SPYANGS YON TAN GYIS DBEN KYANG DAM PA'I MTSAN GYIS BYIN GYIS RLABS RGYU MTSAN DU MAS NAS, MGRIN BZANG GZIGS GYON PA'I NGANG TSUL CAN SH'AKYA'I RJES 'JUG ^BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSOS DUS KYI PHO NYA ZHES PAS PHO RTA'I LOR DANG RTEN DU RJE BTZUN BLA MA DAM PA DE NYID KYI SKU BRNYAN BZHENGS SKABS STON ZLA BA'I TSES BCU DGU'I NYIN SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN THEG PA MCHOG GI DGE BZHI BSHES GNYEN GYIS RJES SU 'DZIN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
author_simple: BLO BZANG THUB BSTAN DBANG PHYUG 'JIGS MED RGYA MTSO,
